identity.description:
Download an embedding database from HuggingFace Hub to local storage.

Download an embedding database from HuggingFace Hub to local storage. Allows accessing databases shared by others or your own backups.
capabilities: Download embedding databases from HuggingFace Hub
Specify local name for downloaded database

action.description: Action to download database from HuggingFace

repository.description: HuggingFace repository to download from (format: username/repo-name)

local_name.description: Local name for the downloaded database (optional, defaults to repo name)

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite existing local database with same name

purpose.model:
SentenceTransformer(
  (0): Transformer({'max_seq_length': 4096, 'do_lower_case': False, 'architecture': 'BertModel'})
  (1): Pooling({'word_embedding_dimension': 384, 'pooling_mode_cls_token': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_tokens': True, 'pooling_mode_max_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_mean_sqrt_len_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_weightedmean_tokens': False, 'pooling_mode_lasttoken': False, 'include_prompt': True})
  (2): Normalize()
)

domain.model:

  (2): Normalize()

action.description: Action to download database from HuggingFace

repository.description: HuggingFace repository to download from (format: username/repo-name)

local_name.description: Local name for the downloaded database (optional, defaults to repo name)

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite existing local database with same name
